message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product for $7,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive price.
Alice, your offer is tempting, but I'm looking to save a bit more. I'm willing to pay $7,000 for the product. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your interest in our product. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept $7,200 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise between our positions.
